subject: Football
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Urban Meyer's father, Bud, and former Ohio State Coach Earle Bruce helped forge the values and work ethic that allowed him to lead Florida into Monday night’s national title game against the Buckeyes.
snippet: Urban Meyer's father, Bud, and former Ohio State Coach Earle Bruce helped forge the values and work ethic that allowed him to lead Florida into Monday night’s national title game against the Buckeyes.
